sentences.cn: 业余演员往往表演过火.

sentences.en: Declan: I'm allowed to bring girls with home but i shouldn't overact it of course.
sentences.cn: 父母允许我带女孩子回家,但是当然不应该有过分的举动.

sentences.en: Slender and decently built, Roberts has the look of a martial arts expert but this is one of those movies where he has a tendency to overact.
sentences.cn: 片中他表现地细致高杆，有一副武术大师的样子，但是这部影片中他也同样显露出“表演过火”的趋向。

sentences.en: Sometimes he had overacted in his role as Prince.
sentences.cn: 有时，他把王子的角色过度演绎了。

words.tran_cn: 过于活跃的；活跃得不正常的
过于活泼，过度活跃；过度活性

trans.tran_en: to act in a play with too much emotion or movement – used to show disapproval
